meaningMnemonic: You know that 日光 is "sunlight" so when you add <kanji>bathe</kanji> you get "sunlight bathe" ... but that sounds dumb, so let's call this word <vocabulary>sunbathe</vocabulary> instead!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
